entries.title: Sunak reshuffle: PM expected to reshape government departments
entries.description: The Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy Department will be reorganised, the BBC understands.

entries.title: Royal Mail February strikes off after legal challenge

entries.title: South Africa's power cuts hit vineyards: No power, no pinot
entries.description: The country's worst-ever energy crisis lead to fears for South Africa's wine industry.

entries.title: Kerala: The transgender couple whose pregnancy photos went viral

entries.title: UK rescue workers heading to Turkey after quake
entries.description: Search specialists with equipment and trained dogs will contribute to an international response.

entries.title: Digital pound likely this decade, Treasury says
entries.description: The Treasury and Bank of England will formally start a consultation for the digital currency, on Tuesday.

entries.title: Blackburn Rovers 0-0 Wigan Athletic: Shaun Maloney draws first game as Latics boss

entries.description: Rishi Sunak has a minibus full of predecessors who could end up as backseat drivers - with Liz Truss the latest to lurch towards the wheel.

entries.title: Suspected Chinese spy balloon was 200ft tall - US defence official
entries.description: An official says the size of the object informed the decision not to shoot it down before Saturday.

entries.title: Women's T20 World Cup 2023: England beat South Africa in warm-up

entries.title: Anthony Joshua: British heavyweight to make comeback against Jermaine Franklin

entries.title: Prepayment meters: Magistrates told to stop allowing forced installations

entries.description: A woman is arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after an incident at a house in Huddersfield.

entries.title: Jury told to convict Andrew Innes of murdering Bennylyn and Jellica Burke
entries.description: Andrew Innes killed Bennylyn and Jellica Burke at his home in Dundee almost two years ago.

entries.title: St Andrews Old Course renovation compared to DIY patio
